thread.title: Triple Crown champion American Pharoah works at Santa Anita
thread.title_full: Triple Crown champion American Pharoah works at Santa Anita | Boston Herald

author: Associated Press
title: Triple Crown champion American Pharoah works at Santa Anita
text:
ARCADIA, Calif. â€” Triple Crown champion American Pharoah completed a five-furlong workout at Santa Anita in preparation for the Breeders' Cup.
The 3-year-old colt was timed in 59.80 seconds Saturday with jockey Martin Garcia aboard.
Trainer Bob Baffert says American Pharoah was in cruising mode and is on schedule to make the final start of his career in the $5 million Classic at Keeneland on Oct. 31.
Baffert says he hasn't decided yet whether American Pharoah will ship to Churchill Downs in Louisville or Keeneland in Lexington. He was going to send the colt on Monday, but that has been postponed.
The colt worked out Saturday because rain is in the forecast for Sunday.
